description:
Mia has been kidnapped, and Satou is hot on the trail of the strange specter that took her. The path leads to the place she originally was rescued from, the massive tower known as the Cradle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Immortality That Began with a Death March
La jeunesse éternelle venant d’une death march
デスマーチからはじまる不老不死
